article_title: PPACA risk corridors gap rocks more carriers
article_text:
For some companies, extra payments from one PPACA lifeboat program may help offset the risk corridors gap. (TS/Aloysius Patrimonio)

Insurance agents and brokers are struggling to get answers to a question they're just learning how to ask: How many health carriers are suffering serious problems as a result of the risk corridors program funding gap?

Are most of the carriers aching from risk corridors' flu of small new plans, or are bigger, older carriers also coughing?

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: A CO-OP executive says she thinks many small and midsize insurers are suffering.
